LanguageData.HC_Roc.label: Roc
LanguageData.HC_Roc.description: It is a huge bird that is said to cover the sky, and is said to be huge enough to eat elephants and rhinos as its main food.

LanguageData.HC_Roc.tools.1.label: beak
